name: Don't Burn the Cauldron!
description:
Collect ingredients but don't let the cauldron burn! Can you keep track of 2 tasks at once? Use your nimble fingers to use both a mouse and the arrow keys at the same time.

Game Border and Book Shelf:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles-supplemental
